channel.title: CVE Feed for kbjohnson90 -- User Shortcodes Plus
channel.description: The latest CVEs for kbjohnson90 -- User Shortcodes Plus

item.title: CVE-2023-6969|2024-03-13T15:26:57.453Z -- kbjohnson90 -- user%20shortcodes%20plus
item.description: The User Shortcodes Plus plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to Insecure Direct Object Reference in all versions up to, and including, 2.0.2 via the user_meta shortcode due to missing validation on a user controlled key. This makes it possible for authenticated attackers, with contributor-level access and above, to retrieve potentially sensitive user meta.
